analysis.description:
Gateway.payToken (/unique_chucks/6/0x3091d37ef18cb33af72cf7ca63714733172ce724.sol#161-172) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,_sellerAddress,_value) (/unique_chucks/6/0x3091d37ef18cb33af72cf7ca63714733172ce724.sol#168-170)

Reentrancy in Gateway.payToken (/unique_chucks/6/0x3091d37ef18cb33af72cf7ca63714733172ce724.sol#161-172):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.allowance(msg.sender,this) >= _value) (/unique_chucks/6/0x3091d37ef18cb33af72cf7ca63714733172ce724.sol#167)
	- token.transferFrom(msg.sender,_sellerAddress,_value) (/unique_chucks/6/0x3091d37ef18cb33af72cf7ca63714733172ce724.sol#168-170)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- payment (/unique_chucks/6/0x3091d37ef18cb33af72cf7ca63714733172ce724.sol#170-171)

Token.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x3091d37ef18cb33af72cf7ca63714733172ce724.sol#77)
Token.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x3091d37ef18cb33af72cf7ca63714733172ce724.sol#77)
Token.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/6/0x3091d37ef18cb33af72cf7ca63714733172ce724.sol#38-40) should be declared external
Token.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/6/0x3091d37ef18cb33af72cf7ca63714733172ce724.sol#42-44) should be declared external
Token.transfer (/unique_chucks/6/0x3091d37ef18cb33af72cf7ca63714733172ce724.sol#48-50) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/6/0x3091d37ef18cb33af72cf7ca63714733172ce724.sol:
